description: Lists the details of a  Protection object.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier (ID) of the protection.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the protection. For example, My CloudFront distributions.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the Amazon Web Services resource that is protected.

nested_items.name: HealthCheckIds
nested_items.description: The unique identifier (ID) for the Route 53 health check that's associated with the protection.

nested_items.name: ProtectionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the protection.

nested_items.name: ApplicationLayerAutomaticResponseConfiguration
nested_items.description: The automatic application layer DDoS mitigation settings for the protection. This configuration determines whether Shield Advanced automatically manages rules in the web ACL in order to respond to application layer events that Shield Advanced determines to be DDoS attacks.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Indicates whether automatic application layer DDoS mitigation is enabled for the protection.
